::Prowl::

Prowl looked into Iron Raptor's eyes as she glanced at him, hearing 
and feeling her thoughts clearly. He felt the regret, and as much as 
he was hurt by her regretting what they had done, he understood. The 
bond they now shared allowed for transfer of thoughts and feelings, 
and therefore transfer of understanding. He didn't understand 
completely, but it was a start.

The one thing he picked up from her that he couldn't understand was 
that she 'thought' that what she felt was love. He had rescued her 
from the Alliance, although Dinobot helped. He had agreed to fuze 
their sparks to let her return to her robot form from the fuze of her 
beast modes. He had slightly messed it up, resulting in the total 
annihilation of both their sparks, but then he did get them both back 
afterward. Prowl doubted that he would have done that for someone he 
didn't love, but he guessed it was just Maximal. Any Maximal would 
save a fellow transformer, but to give up one's spark for someone and 
for her not to think one loved her?

His thoughts drifted back to her previous ones, about them not having 
a first date. Prowl didn't see much of a problem with that, but once 
again he understood how she felt. His eyes lingered on her for a 
second, and then he looked ahead. She needed a first date, that was 
fairly clear. And as he thought about it, he realized that he wouldn't 
mind a date with her either. Maybe somewhere in the holo-rooms, where 
they wouldn't be disturbed. They could get to know each other and 
everything.

Prowl knew he didn't have to comment anymore on the time they had 
spent in her quarters at the Ark. Iron Raptor probably heard his 
thoughts on it previously. Instead, his thoughts flickered briefly to 
his hand, which was still around her waist. If they hadn't had a first 
date yet, would it be right to be touching each other at all times? 
Deciding that it would be better not to, Prowl withdrew his arm from 
her waist, walking alongside her, deep in thought. A first date 
wouldn't be bad, not at all. The one problem was finding the time. The 
Maximals needed Iron Raptor to lead, and there were constant attacks. 
Though maybe soon, sometime when things would calm down, Iron Raptor 
and Prowl could have their date. Prowl knew that that day would come 
sometime. The Maximals had suffered more than any other faction in the 
Neo Beast Wars, and sooner or later they would get their lucky break.

Prowl stopped himself from thinking about the Maximals. He had a plan, 
which he believed Epyon agreed with, and it could help the Maximals. 
Iron Raptor probably had enough to think about without his thoughts on 
the Maximals floating into her head.

-Love,- he thought to her, not really knowing what he was going to ask 
untill he asked her. -Would you like to go on a walk with me sometime? 
Just you and me, maybe in the holo-room. Like, on a date..- He 
inwardly chuckled at himself. -What I'm trying to say is, will you go 
with me on a date?-

There, he had asked her. He knew he would enjoy taking her on a date 
in the holo room, or anywhere else even. His reason for the holo room 
was that there were no Preds that would attack in there, as outside 
there was always a chance of attack. Last time him and Iron Raptor had 
gotten away by themselves out in the woods, two Predacons had 
attacked. A small smile creeps onto Prowl's face, the Maximal 
remembering how the Predacons had ended up running for their lives, 
much thanks to Iron Raptor's second beast mode.

Prowl looked at Iron Raptor, waiting for her to reply and listening to 
her feelings as well.

from

that

was new

programmed to 
> but because she had learned in a very quick amount of time, and so 
had a

wanted to
